definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to pick on sth incessantly (idiom)/to criticize right and left
pinyin: heng2 tiao1 bi2 zi5 shu4 tiao1 yan3

definition: lit. to have one's nose rubbed in the dirt/fig. to meet with a sharp rebuff
rhinophyma (red nose, often related to rosacea or excessive alcohol)/brandy nose
lit. to rub one's nose with dust/to suffer a snub/to meet with a rebuff
lit. to climb all over sb/fig. to take advantage of sb's weakness

sentences.english: His nose is stopped up with a cold.
Kim Yaqian suction aspiration nose, hand- wipe the tears off his face.
sentences.chinese: 金亚倩吸吸鼻子，用手擦拭掉自己脸上的泪痕。

sentences.english: He does everything his wife says; She really leads him by the nose .
sentences.chinese: 他对妻子惟命是从，确实被妻子牵着鼻子走的。

sentences.english: But it caused nose bleeding if having too many of the roots.
sentences.chinese: 可是，有一回吃多了些，鼻子直冒血。

sentences.english: Does sniffing too many scents desensitize your nose?
sentences.chinese: 闻太多的香味你的鼻子会麻木？

sentences.english: I had to go to hospital to have my nose cauterised and treated.
sentences.chinese: 我以前曾经去医院治疗过鼻子。

sentences.english: But after we had started to uphold the precept of not stealing, our lung and nose problesm will gradually diminish.
sentences.chinese: 当我们持守不偷盗戒后，肺部和鼻子只出些小毛病。

sentences.english: Professor McGonagall blew her nose in reply.
sentences.chinese: 麦康娜教授抽动了一下鼻子算是回应。

sentences.english: But I look so stupid with this big zit on my nose.
sentences.chinese: 然则我鼻子上长这个大芳华痘看起来好蠢啊。

sentences.english: Use a wet towel to cover your mouth and nose.
sentences.chinese: 用湿毛巾捂住嘴巴和鼻子。

sentences.english: But while the snub shape may be attractive, it is not necessary a blessing.
sentences.chinese: 尽管翘鼻子可能有魅力，但这未必是福。

sentences.english: It's actually an elongated nose and upper lip.
sentences.chinese: 这实际上是鼻子和上唇的延伸。

sentences.english: People say that a cold wet nose is an indicator of health in dogs or cats.
sentences.chinese: 据说凉凉的湿鼻子表示猫狗健康无病。

sentences.english: The calf is nuzzling its mother.
sentences.chinese: 小牛用鼻子摩擦它的母亲。

sentences.english: The tip of their noses are sensitive to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他们的鼻子尖是太阳敏感。

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
